channel.title: Authentication on Velociraptor - Digging deeper!

item.title: Velociraptor SSO Authentication
item.description: The Velociraptor GUI allows administrators and DFIR team members to rapidly respond and hunt across their entire deployment in seconds. This is a powerful capability, and must be adequately protected. Modes of authentication Velociraptor supports two modes of authentication: Basic authentication Single Sign On using third party OAuth2 logon flow. In the basic authentication mode, GUI users are added by the administrator and given passwords.
